mapper.select: select a.ticket_no,b.time,b.location,c.plate_no from ticket a left join offense b on a.offense_no = b.offense_no left join make_offense c on a.offense_no = c.offense_no where driver_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ticket (ticket_no, driver_id, claim_time, offense_no) values (#{ticket_no},#{id},#{time},#{offense_no})
insert into ticket_detail (detail_no, point, fine, detention, ticket_no) values (#{detail_no},#{point},#{detention},#{ticket_no})
